post.body: Well, today was made of equal parts win and lulz: I met with friends I hadn't seen in months, but flight got canceled until after Christmas.
I AM ABOUT TO EMBARK ON AN EPIC QUEST... TO RETURN A DVD! IN THE SNOW OF DOOM!
WHY have I not slept? Also, it looks likely that our flight will be teh canceled.
We're wremixing when we should be sleeping! As of today, we will be out of state for THE REST OF THE YEAR! DUN DUN DUN.
AAAAaaaaaand the power just went out. Loverly.
As usual, the weathermen were wrong about the snow. But this time, it came earlier and there was more. CAN HAZ ALTERNET DEEMENTION PL0X?
I actually got to sleep! I'm so proud of myself. Also, get http://tinyurl.com/js2itunes NAOW. Oh, and working on a wrave song!
FLOBBERWORM. Why I am still awake?
I went sledding! At 11 pm. In the street. On one of those road block thingies.
THE SNOW IS BLOWING HORIZONTALLY.
Is packing for Colorado, and insisting that the sky was indeed red.
Just got a REALLY interesting idea. What if there was a band whose lyrics were based entirely around Twitter updates?
Just played a fun game of Rick, gonna meet with friends I haven't seen in weeks on Sunday, snow expected, things looking up!
Editing together the snow vids! Will probably be up tomorrow. NEED MOAR SLEEPS.
Got my songs recorded, and uploaded! And I played in the snow! And I videographed that!
MYSPACE WHY ARE YOU BEING MEAN TO MY SONGS?
OW. Two Archie-centered songs in three days. Not good for my throat...
quick record then play in snow!
PROJECT FOR AWESOME!!! http://tinyurl.com/667bkd
IT'S SNOWING! EXPECT EPIC VIDS!
